description: This file defines the interface for the subsystem manager in a device management system, including function prototypes, type definitions, and macros related to subsystem initialization, readiness checking, and configuration management.

methods.name: subsystemManagerInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the subsystem manager with callbacks for initialization and readiness for devices.

methods.name: subsystemManagerShutdown
methods.description: Shuts down the subsystem manager, cleaning up resources.

methods.name: subsystemManagerAllDriversStarted
methods.description: Informs the subsystem manager that all device drivers have been loaded.

methods.name: subsystemManagerAllServicesAvailable
methods.description: Informs the subsystem manager that all services are available.

methods.name: subsystemManagerIsOcfEnabled
methods.description: Checks if OCF (Open Connectivity Foundation) features are enabled.

methods.name: subsystemManagerIsSubsystemReady
methods.description: Checks if a specific subsystem is ready for devices.

methods.name: subsystemManagerIsReadyForDevices
methods.description: Checks if all subsystems are ready for devices.

methods.name: subsystemManagerRestoreConfig
methods.description: Restores configuration for RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization) purposes.

methods.name: subsystemManagerPostRestoreConfig
methods.description: Performs actions after restoring configuration for RMA.
